mapper.select: SELECT id, name, height, weight, age, gender, activity, goal, health_condition, allergies, disliked_food, target_weight, -- ▼▼▼ [여기 추가] 콤마(,) 잊지 마세요! ▼▼▼ level, exp, current_points FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, activity = #{activity}, goal = #{goal}, target_weight = #{targetWeight} WHERE id = #{id}
